credit_line: Bequest of Mrs. Horace W. Frost
title: Majnun in the Wilderness, Surrounded by Animals (from a "Khamsa" of Nizami manuscript)
medium: opaque watercolor on paper, heightened with gold
inscriptions: l.c. in ink and watercolor heightened with gold: [calligraphic inscription]; l.l. in black ink: [calligraphic inscription]; recto l.c. in pencil: 3; verso in black ink, opaque watercolor and gold: [four columns of calligraphic inscription], ["9 1/4 x 5 1/2"]
